first_translate: it’s so cold!
l-lady fiona! please stay focused on your surroundings!
if monsters come while we’re not paying attention, what will we do then?!
oh...
this was his first time out here today, wasn’t it?
his name was allen or something like that.
don’t worry about me.
I’m fully aware of everything around us right now.
haa... hah...

hangle: 내가 발견하지 않았으면 큰일 났을 거예요.
first_translate: we would’ve been doomed had I not noticed them coming our way.
don’t think too much about it.
let’s just take a deep breath and look at our surroundings carefully.
the moment we let our guards down, we’ll end up becoming food for those beasts.
uhh...
mm...
oops, he looks more scared than I thought.
maybe I should try comforting him.
try not to get too nervous.

hangle: 그런 일이 없도록 지켜 주기 위해서
first_translate: that’s why I came along with all of you.
to make sure nothing bad happens.
now, shall we work together?
f-fiona--
fi--
lady fiona--!!
eek!
aargh?!
i-it’s a monster head!!!
sigh...
my efforts to comfort him were in vain.
come on, don’t forget that they are still young recruits.

hangle: 좀 더 신경을 써줘야 하는 거 알잖아.
first_translate: you need to show some compassion toward them.
hmph.

hangle: 멍하니 있지 말고 피했으면 될 일이야.
first_translate: all he needed to do was dodge instead of standing there frozen stiff.

hangle: 시그렌… 예전엔 예쁘장한 느낌이 남아 있었는데.
first_translate: siegren used to have such a pretty face when he was younger.

hangle: 이제는 이런 잔혹한 풍경에 서 있는데도,
first_translate: but even though he stands amidst these gruesome scenes,
well... rather than being scary,
for some reason, it suits him quite well--
siegren.
he has grown into a handsome man.
what?
isn’t he over puberty by now?
he’s already nineteen years old!
of course, I am.
when you scare someone, you must apologize afterward.
and didn’t abel tell you to train the newbies properly?

hangle: 고작 이 정도로 놀라면 곤란한 건 이쪽이지.
first_translate: if this is enough to startle you, you’re in trouble.
this is only...
...the beginning.
we’re dead meat...
siegren...!
what?

hangle: 아벨이 평소에 다른 사람들이랑 지내는데 큰 문제는 없었댔는데,
first_translate: abel said that normally, you got along fine with other people.
then why are you always acting like this whenever you see me?
give me back my sword.
everyone! don’t worry.
at first, I felt exactly how you feel right now!

hangle: 여러분도 곧 잘하실 수 있을 거예요!
first_translate: soon, you guys will also learn to fight better!
p-please excuse me!! may I ask you a question?!

hangle: 병, 병사들 중에 피오나 님을 호위할 사람을 뽑는다고 들었습니다!
first_translate: I-I heard that among the soldiers, lady fiona will choose her personal bodyguard!

hangle: 저, 저도 신참이지만 열심히 하면 뽑힐까요?!
first_translate: I know I’m a newbie myself, but can I apply for the position if I work hard?!
how unexpected...!
oh!
as the soldiers accompanying me are veterans,

hangle: 신참 입장에서는 동경하게 되는 것도 무리는 아니지.
first_translate: it makes sense that newcomers might admire them.
of course.
I’ll wait for you.
flash
flash
why does she keep flirting with everyone else except me...?
stop whining already.
or else you’ll discourage the others again!
for some reason, I feel like siegren is slowly turning into abel...

hangle: 시그렌이 아벨을 닮아 가는 느낌이 든단 말이야…
first_translate: it’s already been five years since I arrived in hailon.

hangle: 내가 헤일론에 온 후 벌써 5년이란 시간이 지났다.
first_translate: that means the story from the original novel isn’t far away anymore.

hangle: 원작의 시작까지 얼마 남지 않았다는 뜻이다.
first_translate: right now, I’m eighteen years old.
siegren turned nineteen recently.
naturally, both of us will turn another year older within several months.

hangle: 물론 몇 개월 뒤면 둘 다 한 살씩 더 먹을 예정이고.
first_translate: until now, siegren kept his childhood promise.

hangle: 그동안 시그렌은 어린 시절의 다짐을 지켰다.
first_translate: not only did he continue learning swordsmanship under abel according to the plot,

hangle: 원작의 흐름대로 아벨에게 검을 배우는 중이고,
first_translate: but he rose through the ranks until he could enter and leave hailon castle freely.

hangle: 헤일론 성을 자유롭게 드나들 수 있는 위치에 올랐다.
first_translate: no one dared treat him poorly anymore,
even though many feared his strength.

hangle: 그를 함부로 대하는 사람은 아무도 없었다.
first_translate: in my own ways, I worked very hard to achieve my initial goal...
...of living a peaceful life.

hangle: 즉 평화로운 삶을 이루기 위해 열심히 노력했다.
first_translate: I received considerable compensation for protecting the city walls,

hangle: 나는 성벽을 지키는 대가로 상당한 보수를 받았다.
first_translate: and selling materials obtained from monsters earned me a lot of money as well.

hangle: 마물의 재료를 판 돈도 꽤 많고.
first_translate: to put it bluntly, I won’t ever have to worry about making ends meet.

hangle: 솔직히 평생 먹고살 걱정이 없을 정도다.
first_translate: all I wanted to do now was watch siegren meet eunice...
...and begin walking the golden path as the protagonist.

hangle: 주인공답게 황금 길을 걸어가는 모습만 확인하고,
first_translate: be happy forevermore!
with that done, I’d spend the rest of my days enjoying a leisurely lifestyle.
but...
there happened to be someone who ruined my plans...

hangle: 이 안락한 계획을 방해하는 사람이 있었으니…
first_translate: fiona,
have you given any further consideration regarding my previous suggestion?

hangle: 이전에 내가 한 제안에 대해서는 생각해봤느냐.
first_translate: about that...
that proposal is the biggest obstacle blocking my future plan...

hangle: 이 제안이 내 미래 계획을 방해하는 가장 큰 요소다….
first_translate: go ahead and call me father.
ugh...
that’s right. abel’s recent offer to me was none other than...

hangle: 그랬다. 아벨이 내게 최근에 한 제안은 바로
first_translate: ...for me “to become his adoptive daughter.”
I refuse.
can’t you pretend to consider it before answering?
but I planned out my entire life after arriving in hailon.

hangle: 하지만 제 인생 계획은 헤일론에 왔을 때부터 짜 놓은걸요.
first_translate: I need to marry off siegren and enjoy my retirement somewhere quiet.

hangle: 시그렌을 결혼시키고 평화로운 곳에서 노후 생활을 보내야 해요.
first_translate: poor little siegren...
pity poor siegren...
